title: How healthy is the current game state?
body:
Hello,

Some of you may know me, I used to participate in the old forums a lot.
I decided to take a really needed break from the game for several months, I don't really know how long it has been, but I am curious how the game is to everyone at the moment?

Is it worth me coming back and giving it a go for some fun?

replies.body: Don't know how long you been away from but they remade summoners rift.

Certainly! Not sure how long you've been gone for but recently there's been a few new champs introduced {{champion:245}} {{champion:223}} , and a few champ reworks {{champion:41}} {{champion:114}}. The community hasn't really changed much, still the same as always, but nevertheless you should come back and refresh yourself with some more good game fun :)
Apart from ridiculous minionblock atm and vayne its fine.

Well, a lot of champion updates, new (broken) champions.
Fiora has a new Ulti, her Q is now skillshot, also her W (parry).
Gangplank has a new E, his ulti can upgrade (somehow).

Over all it's still good, the map has been updated (as well as minions, monsters (even new monsters), and towers).
{{champion:103}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:67}}  <---------- these people have new splash backs :)

But I'm starting to not play LoL anymore, but I'm starting to play CS:GO

the games still fun for me anyway there are some changes look up the patch notes if your able to, for all the buff/nerf options gangplank has been reworked and his default skin looks much better plus some tweaks with his abilities, um best advice i can give is give it a go again for yourself and after few games decide whether you are up for it or not?
